item.title: 配置 Visual Studio Code 作为 Git 默认合并工具和对比工具
item.author: 作者
item.description: 将下列内容添加到 .gitconfig 中 # Comment: Start of "Extra Block" # Comment: To unlock Visual Studio Code as your Git diff and Git merge tool [merge] tool = vscode [mergetool "vscode"] cmd = code --wait $MERGED [diff] tool = vscode [difftool "vscode"] cmd = code --wait --diff $LOCAL $REMOTE # Comment: End of "Extra Block" 参考文献 How to use Visual Studio
